cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.description: A classic cocktail made with gin and dry vermouth.

ingredients: Olive or lemon twist for garnish
steps: Add gin and vermouth to a mixing glass filled with ice.
Stir well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with an olive or lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.description: A refreshing cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec.

ingredients: Lime wheel or salt rim for garnish
steps: Add tequila, lime juice, and triple sec to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a glass with a salted rim.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.description: A fresh cocktail made with rum, lime, mint, sugar, and soda water.

ingredients: Lime wedge and mint sprig for garnish
steps: Muddle mint leaves and sugar in a glass.
Add lime juice and rum, then fill the glass with ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge and mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A simple and delicious cocktail made with rum, lime juice, and sugar.

steps: Add rum, lime juice, and simple syrup to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: A traditional cocktail made with bourbon or rye whiskey, sugar, and bitters.

steps: Muddle the sugar cube and bitters in a glass.
Add ice and whiskey, then stir gently.
Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.description: A bold and bitter cocktail made with gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.

steps: Add gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth to a mixing glass filled with ice.
Stir well and strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Piña Colada
cocktails.description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice.

ingredients: Pineapple slice and cherry for garnish
steps: Add rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice to a blender with ice.
Blend until smooth and pour into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.description: A rich cocktail made with rum, orange curaçao, lime juice, and orgeat syrup.

ingredients: Lime wheel and mint sprig for garnish
steps: Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lime wheel and mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.description: A visually stunning cocktail made with tequila, orange juice, and grenadine.

ingredients: Orange slice and cherry for garnish
steps: Add tequila and orange juice to a glass filled with ice.
Slowly pour grenadine over the back of a spoon to create a sunrise effect.
Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

cocktails.name: Blue Hawaiian
cocktails.description: A cool and refreshing cocktail made with rum, blue curaçao, coconut cream, and pineapple juice.

ingredients: Pineapple slice and cherry for garnish
steps: Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry.

cocktails.name: Singapore Sling
cocktails.description: A colorful cocktail made with gin, cherry heering, grenadine, pineapple juice, and lime juice.

ingredients: Pineapple slice and cherry for garnish
steps: Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
cocktails.description: A strong cocktail made with dark rum and ginger beer.

steps: Fill a glass with ice and add ginger beer.
Slowly pour dark rum over the back of a spoon to float it on top.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: A coffee-flavored cocktail made with vodka, coffee liqueur, and espresso.

steps: Add vodka, coffee liqueur, and espresso to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a few coffee beans.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: A sophisticated cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice.

steps: Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.

cocktails.name: Apple Martini
cocktails.description: A tangy cocktail made with vodka, apple schnapps, and lime juice.

steps: Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with an apple slice.

cocktails.name: Raspberry Mojito
cocktails.description: A twist on the classic mojito with raspberries.

ingredients: Lime wedge and mint sprig for garnish
steps: Muddle raspberries, mint leaves, and sugar in a glass.
Add lime juice and rum, then fill the glass with ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge and mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Pink Lady
cocktails.description: A sweet and smooth cocktail made with gin, applejack, lemon juice, grenadine, and egg white.

steps: Add all ingredients to a shaker without ice and shake well.
Add ice to the shaker and shake again.
Strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.description: A bubbly cocktail made with gin, champagne, lemon juice, and sugar.

steps: Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a champagne flute.
Top with champagne.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.description: A spicy cocktail made with vodka and tomato juice.

ingredients: Celery salt and pepper to taste
Celery stalk and lemon wedge for garnish
steps: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice.
Roll the mixture between the shaker and another glass.
Strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a celery stalk and lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Paper Plane
cocktails.description: A balanced cocktail made with bourbon, Aperol, Amaro Nonino, and lemon juice.

steps: Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Aperol Spritz
cocktails.description: A light and refreshing cocktail made with Aperol, Prosecco, and soda water.

steps: Fill a glass with ice.
Add Aperol and Prosecco.
Top with soda water.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Madmouazelle
cocktails.description: A fruity cocktail made with vodka, peach schnapps, and cranberry juice.

steps: Add vodka, peach schnapps, and cranberry juice to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Hibiscus Margarita
cocktails.description: A vibrant cocktail made with tequila, hibiscus syrup, and lime juice.

steps: Add tequila, hibiscus syrup, and lime juice to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a glass with a salted rim.
Garnish with a lime wheel.
